revised_title: Meteoritic Environment of the Moon: Earth-Crossing Asteroids and Cometary Nuclei
tldr: This article discusses the meteoritic environment of the Moon, focusing on Earth-crossing asteroids and cometary nuclei. The author estimates the influx rate of particles on the Moon and examines the distribution of masses and sizes of these objects. The study also considers the possible contribution of cometary nuclei to the Apollo asteroids and the implications for the development of comets.
